div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 280 Attica, 1906 (99) Burial: c. 140-130 B.C. (T); c. 87 (Price) Contents: 86+ AE Athens: 1 3rd cent. (as Svoronos pl. 22, 62 ff.) 69 New Style (as Sv. pl. 22, 53-8 [12]; pl. 81 [38]; pl. 24, 62 ff. [19]) 15 "Delian" types (as Sv. pl. 107, 50 [8]; 57 [1]; 75 [6]) Eleusis: 1 (as Sv. pl. 103, 1 ff.) Disposition: Athens Svoronos, JIAN 1906, pp. 298-9 Thompson, Athens, pp. 526 ff. Price, NC 1964, pp. 27-36
